TriggerOraclev10g.name: IVR_SADER_DETAIL
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
DECLARE
tmpVar NUMBER;
/******************************************************************************
NAME:
PURPOSE:

REVISIONS:
Ver Date Author Description
--------- ---------- --------------- ------------------------------------
1.0 20/03/2007 1. Created this trigger.

NOTES:

Automatically available Auto Replace Keywords:
Object Name:
Sysdate: 20/03/2007
Date and Time: 20/03/2007, 02:25:52 ?, and 20/03/2007 02:25:52 ?
Username: (set in TOAD Options, Proc Templates)
Table Name: (set in the "New PL/SQL Object" dialog)
Trigger Options: (set in the "New PL/SQL Object" dialog)
******************************************************************************/
BEGIN
if inserting then
if :new.ORGINAL_FLAG = 1 then
update "OSD"."OSD_IVR"
set sader_to = :new.sader_to
where process_no = :new.process_no
and process_year = :new.year;
end if;
end if;
END ;
